# Task: Impove your Mini Statistical Report 

Use the previous mini report involving the "titanic.csv" dataset and use the academic convention to communicate the results on whether **if passenger's gender and age had an influence on their the fares of their tickets**.

Comment these results in term of acceptance/reject of the null hypotheses using the p-value. Conclude on your alternative hypotheses.

To obtain the corrections, email your answers to damien.dupre@dcu.ie.
